title: Революция Z
overview: Революция Z follows the emotionally busy everyday life of a group of students who face a bunch of challenges and barriers to pursuing their musical dream. Friendship, love, competition, prejudice, intrigue, struggle for supremacy, justice and a chance to grow up, even sex - all this is part of the lives of fifteen-year-old dreamers and rebels, as well as the colorful routine of their teachers and parents.
